snippet: Wesley Wang, a former analyst at SAC Capital Advisors, the hedge fund, has given federal agents the names of about 20 people that he said engaged in insider trading.
abstract: Wesley Wang, a former analyst at SAC Capital Advisors, the hedge fund, has given federal agents the names of about 20 people that he said engaged in insider trading.

headline.main: Former SAC Analyst Cooperates in Insider Trading Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-Analyst Cooperates In Insider Trade Case
